verses.text: \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w*: \w There|strong="G1510"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w a|strong="G2192"\w* \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* \w rich|strong="G4145"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w* \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w had|strong="G2192"\w* \w a|strong="G2192"\w* \w steward|strong="G3623"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w same|strong="G0846"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* accused unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w had|strong="G2192"\w* wasted \w his|strong="G0846"\w* goods.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w steward|strong="G3623"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w within|strong="G1722"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w*: \w What|strong="G5101"\w* \w shall|strong="G2962"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w do|strong="G4160"\w*, \w because|strong="G3754"\w* \w my|strong="G1722"\w* \w lord|strong="G2962"\w* taketh \w away|strong="G0851"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w me|strong="G3004"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w stewardship|strong="G3622"\w*? \w To|strong="G3004"\w* \w dig|strong="G4626"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w am|strong="G2480"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w able|strong="G2480"\w*; \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w beg|strong="G1871"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w am|strong="G2480"\w* \w ashamed|strong="G0153"\w*.

Therefore \w calling|strong="G4341"\w* \w together|strong="G2532"\w* \w every|strong="G1538"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w of|strong="G2962"\w* \w his|strong="G1438"\w* \w lord’s|strong="G2962"\w* \w debtors|strong="G5533"\w*, \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w first|strong="G4413"\w*: \w How|strong="G4214"\w* \w much|strong="G4214"\w* dost thou \w owe|strong="G3784"\w* \w my|strong="G3004"\w* \w lord|strong="G2962"\w*?

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*: \w An|strong="G2532"\w* \w hundred|strong="G1540"\w* barrels \w of|strong="G3004"\w* \w oil|strong="G1637"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: \w Take|strong="G1209"\w* thy \w bill|strong="G1121"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w sit|strong="G2523"\w* \w down|strong="G2523"\w* \w quickly|strong="G5030"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w write|strong="G1125"\w* \w fifty|strong="G4004"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w another|strong="G2087"\w*: \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w how|strong="G4214"\w* \w much|strong="G4214"\w* dost thou \w owe|strong="G3784"\w*? \w Who|strong="G3588"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*: \w An|strong="G2532"\w* \w hundred|strong="G1540"\w* quarters \w of|strong="G3004"\w* \w wheat|strong="G4621"\w*. \w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: \w Take|strong="G1209"\w* thy \w bill|strong="G1121"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w write|strong="G1125"\w* \w eighty|strong="G3589"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w commended|strong="G1867"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* unjust \w steward|strong="G3623"\w*, forasmuch \w as|strong="G1519"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w had|strong="G1510"\w* \w done|strong="G4160"\w* wisely: \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* children \w of|strong="G5207"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w world|strong="G0165"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* wiser \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w their|strong="G1438"\w* \w generation|strong="G1074"\w* \w than|strong="G5228"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* children \w of|strong="G5207"\w* \w light|strong="G5457"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*: \w Make|strong="G4160"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w friends|strong="G5384"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* mammon \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w iniquity|strong="G0093"\w*; \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w when|strong="G3752"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* \w fail|strong="G1587"\w*, \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w may|strong="G2532"\w* \w receive|strong="G1209"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* everlasting \w dwellings|strong="G4633"\w*.

\w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G1510"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w faithful|strong="G4103"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w that|strong="G1510"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w least|strong="G1646"\w*, \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w faithful|strong="G4103"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w that|strong="G1510"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w greater|strong="G4183"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G1510"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w unjust|strong="G0094"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w that|strong="G1510"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w little|strong="G1646"\w*, \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w unjust|strong="G0094"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w that|strong="G1510"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w greater|strong="G4183"\w*.

\w If|strong="G1487"\w* \w then|strong="G3767"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w have|strong="G1096"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w been|strong="G1096"\w* \w faithful|strong="G4103"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w unjust|strong="G0094"\w* mammon; \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w will|strong="G5101"\w* trust \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w that|strong="G4100"\w* \w which|strong="G5101"\w* \w is|strong="G5101"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w true|strong="G0228"\w*?

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w been|strong="G1096"\w* \w faithful|strong="G4103"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w that|strong="G1096"\w* \w which|strong="G5101"\w* \w is|strong="G5101"\w* \w another’s|strong="G0245"\w*; \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w will|strong="G5101"\w* \w give|strong="G1325"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w that|strong="G1096"\w* \w which|strong="G5101"\w* \w is|strong="G5101"\w* \w your|strong="G1487"\w* \w own|strong="G0245"\w*?

\w No|strong="G3756"\w* \w servant|strong="G3610"\w* \w can|strong="G1410"\w* \w serve|strong="G1398"\w* \w two|strong="G1417"\w* \w masters|strong="G2962"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w either|strong="G2228"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w will|strong="G2316"\w* \w hate|strong="G3404"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w love|strong="G0025"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w other|strong="G2087"\w*; \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w will|strong="G2316"\w* hold \w to|strong="G1410"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w despise|strong="G2706"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w other|strong="G2087"\w*. \w You|strong="G2532"\w* \w cannot|strong="G3756"\w* \w serve|strong="G1398"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* mammon.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w Pharisees|strong="G5330"\w*, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w were|strong="G3956"\w* covetous, \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w things|strong="G3778"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* derided \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*: \w You|strong="G5210"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w justify|strong="G1344"\w* \w yourselves|strong="G1438"\w* \w before|strong="G1799"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* knoweth \w your|strong="G2532"\w* \w hearts|strong="G2588"\w*; \w for|strong="G3754"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w which|strong="G3748"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w high|strong="G5308"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w*, \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w an|strong="G1510"\w* \w abomination|strong="G0946"\w* \w before|strong="G1799"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w The|strong="G3956"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w prophets|strong="G4396"\w* \w were|strong="G3956"\w* \w until|strong="G3360"\w* \w John|strong="G2491"\w*; \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w that|strong="G3956"\w* \w time|strong="G5119"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w kingdom|strong="G0932"\w* \w of|strong="G0932"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w is|strong="G2316"\w* \w preached|strong="G2097"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w one|strong="G1438"\w* useth \w violence|strong="G0971"\w* towards \w it|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w it|strong="G1161"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w easier|strong="G2123"\w* \w for|strong="G1520"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w earth|strong="G1093"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w pass|strong="G3928"\w*, \w than|strong="G2228"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* tittle \w of|strong="G3551"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w fall|strong="G4098"\w*.

\w Every|strong="G3956"\w* \w one|strong="G3588"\w* \w that|strong="G3956"\w* putteth \w away|strong="G0630"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w wife|strong="G1135"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* marrieth \w another|strong="G2087"\w*, committeth \w adultery|strong="G3431"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G3956"\w* marrieth \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w that|strong="G3956"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* put \w away|strong="G0630"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w husband|strong="G0435"\w*, committeth \w adultery|strong="G3431"\w*.

\w There|strong="G1510"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w a|strong="G1510"\w* \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* \w rich|strong="G4145"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w*, \w who|strong="G0444"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* clothed \w in|strong="G2596"\w* \w purple|strong="G4209"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w fine|strong="G1040"\w* \w linen|strong="G1040"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* feasted \w sumptuously|strong="G2988"\w* \w every|strong="G2596"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w there|strong="G1161"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w a|strong="G0906"\w* \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* beggar, \w named|strong="G3686"\w* \w Lazarus|strong="G2976"\w*, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w lay|strong="G4434"\w* \w at|strong="G4314"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w gate|strong="G4440"\w*, full \w of|strong="G3686"\w* \w sores|strong="G1669"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w* \w came|strong="G1096"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w pass|strong="G1096"\w*, \w that|strong="G1096"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* beggar \w died|strong="G0599"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w carried|strong="G0667"\w* \w by|strong="G5259"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w angels|strong="G0032"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w Abraham’s|strong="G0011"\w* \w bosom|strong="G2859"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w rich|strong="G4145"\w* \w man|strong="G4145"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w died|strong="G0599"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w buried|strong="G2290"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* hell.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w lifting|strong="G1869"\w* \w up|strong="G1869"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w eyes|strong="G3788"\w* \w when|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* torments, \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w saw|strong="G3708"\w* \w Abraham|strong="G0011"\w* afar \w off|strong="G0575"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Lazarus|strong="G2976"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w bosom|strong="G2859"\w*:

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w cried|strong="G5455"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*: \w Father|strong="G3962"\w* \w Abraham|strong="G0011"\w*, \w have|strong="G1653"\w* \w mercy|strong="G1653"\w* \w on|strong="G1722"\w* \w me|strong="G3004"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w send|strong="G3992"\w* \w Lazarus|strong="G2976"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w may|strong="G2532"\w* \w dip|strong="G0911"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w tip|strong="G0206"\w* \w of|strong="G3962"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w finger|strong="G1147"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w water|strong="G5204"\w*, \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w cool|strong="G2711"\w* \w my|strong="G1722"\w* \w tongue|strong="G1100"\w*: \w for|strong="G3754"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w am|strong="G3600"\w* tormented \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w flame|strong="G5395"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Abraham|strong="G0011"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w him|strong="G3870"\w*: \w Son|strong="G5043"\w*, \w remember|strong="G3403"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* thou didst \w receive|strong="G0618"\w* \w good|strong="G0018"\w* \w things|strong="G0018"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* thy \w lifetime|strong="G2222"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w likewise|strong="G3668"\w* Lazareth \w evil|strong="G2556"\w* \w things|strong="G0018"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w now|strong="G1161"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w is|strong="G0018"\w* \w comforted|strong="G3870"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* thou art tormented.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w besides|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w*, \w between|strong="G3342"\w* \w us|strong="G1722"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, \w there|strong="G1564"\w* \w is|strong="G3778"\w* \w fixed|strong="G4741"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w great|strong="G3173"\w* chaos: \w so|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G3704"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w would|strong="G2309"\w* pass \w from|strong="G3361"\w* \w hence|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, \w cannot|strong="G3361"\w*, \w nor|strong="G3366"\w* \w from|strong="G3361"\w* thence \w come|strong="G1224"\w* hither.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*: \w Then|strong="G3767"\w*, \w father|strong="G3962"\w*, \w I|strong="G1473"\w* beseech thee, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* thou wouldst \w send|strong="G3992"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w my|strong="G3004"\w* \w father’s|strong="G3962"\w* \w house|strong="G3624"\w*, \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w have|strong="G1473"\w* five brethren,
